Sentence.value: Images that come through the eye's lens are focused on the retina.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: [[Images|C0025086]] that come through the eye's lens are focused on the [[retina|C0035298]].

Sentence.value: Sometimes photos or special scans of the retina can show things that the provider cannot see just by looking at the retina through the ophthalmoscope.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Sometimes photos or special [[scans|C0441633]] of the [[retina|C0035298]] can show things that the provider cannot see just by looking at the [[retina|C0035298]] through the ophthalmoscope.
